gen:link.msg:message: `BalanceIncomeAndExpenses` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_BalanceIncomeAndExpenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_BalanceIncomeAndExpenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBalanceIncomeAndExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Expenses` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Expenses')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Expenses return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfExpensesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Expenses` BEHOORT minimaal één keer voor te komen met `SeparateMember`, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup` gelijk is aan `Enkelvoudig`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtValueThnFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_IncomeExpensesStatementEducation_PrtValueThnFST1ExistenceCovDPU1_DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
